## Plan Your Visit

to the Fall River Historical Society

  * [Home](https://fallriverhistorical.org/)
  * Visit

### **Hours of Operation**

**Due to a major infrastructure project, the FRHS Museum will be closed to the public  
beginning on Saturday, July 22, 2023. We apologize for any inconvenience.  
The Museum Shop is open M-F, 9-3, Saturdays, 10-2 pm. and available online.  
**

If you need assistance, please call us during office hours at 508-679-1071. Thank you!

* * *

### Museum Opening Hours

### Museum Hours

Due to a major infrastructure project, the FRHS Museum is closed. We apologize for any inconvenience.

### Museum Store Hours

Monday through Friday, 9 am to 3 pm, Saturdays, 10 am to 2 pm.

*We're closed all major holidays.

### Admission Prices

### Tours

  * Adults: $12
  * Children (ages 6-15):  $8
  * AAA Cardholders $11.50
  * FRHS MEMBERS and ONE GUEST FREE

  * Group (10 or more) Adults: $11.50
  * Group Child (ages 6-15):  $7.50

The Fall River Historical Society is

## Where History Matters.

We are dedicated to collecting and exhibiting artifacts relative to the history and multi-cultural people of Fall River.

[Find Out More](https://fallriverhistorical.org/about-us/)

Rotating exhibits are presented in

## The Douglas Hills Borden & Joan Louise Borden Gallery.

Recent Acquisitions in Nineteenth and Twentieth Century Paintings, Drawings, and Sculpture

[Find Out More](https://fallriverhistorical.org/borden-gallery/)

The Fall River Historical Society presents

## A Recent Acquisition.

Apples in Paper Bag   
by Bryant Chapin, 1922

[Find Out More](https://fallriverhistorical.org/collections/recent-acquisitions/)

The Fall River Historical Society is

## "...absolutely beautiful and full   
of incredible artifacts."

Trip Advisor

[Find Out More](https://fallriverhistorical.org/about-us/)

The Museum Shop & Boutique is

## A popular SouthCoast shopping destination.

Open Weekdays from April to December 30.  
Open daily from Thanksgiving to December 30.
